ComicInfo.Summary:
Bzoma, the amnesiac astronaut and Gasolina, his hugely muscled female companion, have left the dense, nightmarish Big Rotten Apple for the wide-open road of the Mid-western deserts.
What started out as a lucid road-trip turns decidedly bizarre when the astronaut's past comes full circle to hunt him down...
ComicInfo.Title: Hobo Sapiens
